author: cstroud
title: Shocking moment two yobs exchange blows in broad daylight in Grimsby in front of families and shoppers

organizations.name: south west news service a humberside police

text:
BARBERSHOP BRAWL Shocking moment two yobs exchange blows in broad daylight in Grimsby in front of families and shoppers 
Brutal fight that went on for over a minute erupted at half ten in the morning By CARL STROUD Comments A PAIR of yobs traded blows in a shocking brawl outside a barbershop in broad daylight. 
The brutal fight fight erupted at half ten in the morning – forcing mums with prams to shelter their kids. SWNS:South West News Service Pair of yobs traded blows outside a barbershop in broad daylight SWNS:South West News Service Thugs grapple with each other as pair look on without intervening 
Brutal fight between pair of yobs erupted at half ten in the morning SWNS:South West News Service One of the yobs shows a cut to the face as his adversary squares up to him 
Blood splattered the pavement as the pair threw punches and kicks at each other. 
Passing cars were forced to swerve as the altercation in the town centre of Grimsby, Humberside, yesterday morning, spilled into the road. 
A nearby trader raised the alarm by calling Humberside Police. 
The shopkeeper who did not wish to be named said: “It was shocking. It is disgusting to see this sort of thing going on in broad daylight in front of children.” 
A passerby said: “This had been brewing for a while. There was an argument earlier, but now it has got serious. It’s not nice to have to witness it.” RELATED STORIES Footage shows mass brawl outside Edinburgh pub hours after Hearts vs Hibs game DUST UP IN DEPARTURES Shocking moment 'drunk' passengers brawl with airline staff 'after being told flight was delayed' prem star's club shame Teen needs six stitches after being 'glassed' in the head during footie ace Troy Deeney's 3am nightclub brawl ‘HE LOOKED AGITATED’ Brit dad who died in fight with couple at Tenerife hotel was seen 'venting about fellow holidaymaker in heated row two hours before brawl' WILD WEST BRAWL Reveller caught up in shocking 100-man Wetherspoons brawl claims it was sparked by 'mistaken identity' 
The two men continued to fight for over a minute but separated and continued to hurl abuse at one another before the man with the head injury walked away. 
A Humberside Police spokesman said: “We were called at 10.40am today reporting two men fighting outside Boyes on Freeman Street, Grimsby. We attended the area and the men had left and have received no complaints from either man involved.” SWNS:South West News Service Shirtless yob lands a sickening blow to the head of his opponent as pair scrap outside barbershop SWNS:South West News Service The brawl spilled over into the road forcing cars to swerve SWNS:South West News Service Mums with prams were forced to shelter their kids from the extraordinary fight SWNS:South West News Service A shopkeeper said: ‘It is disgusting to see this sort of thing going on in broad daylight in front of children’. SWNS:South West News Service After the pair stopped scrapping they continued to hurl abuse at each other SWNS:South West News Service A Humberside Police spokesperson confirmed they had received a call about the disturbance
